songs.title: School Shooter
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippets

[Verse 1: XXXTENTACION]
Action-packed, school shooter
Slit throats, these kids get fucked up
Hang his ass for five, poke his eyes out
The heat sync, who the fuck protecting us?
Oh, you proud? Then buckle up
'Cause I got questions for you fuckers, I've had enough

[Chorus: Lil Wayne]
Triple X-X, pop a triple X, uh
A school shooter asked me to test you, yeah, uh
Tell the principal, I ain't got no principles
I don't need no school, I got internet, yeah
Killers cool, calling me different, yeah
So I'm tryna work on my differences, yeah
Cool 'cause they still smoke cigarettes-
